Package org.letras.ps.region.broker.simple

Interface Summary
IRegionProviderListener Listens for updates to the regions managed by a RegionProvider.
 

Class Summary
LocalRegion A LocalRegion is an adapter as well as a proxy for the remote IRegion interface.
RegionProvider A mechanism that exposes IRegions and their update notifications to the SimpleRegionBroker.
RegionSetProvider A RegionProvider that watches the network for RegionSets and manages their regions through individual sub-providers SingleRegionSetProvider.
ServiceBasedRegionProvider  
SimpleRegionBroker The SimpleRegionBroker is the connection between the incomplete local region model in the RegionManager and the complete region model which can be distributed over several nodes participating in the system.
SingleRegionSetProvider A region provider that manages the regions of a single RegionSet, which is in turn managed by RegionSetProvider.
